external_references.description: DHS/CISA, Cyber National Mission Force. (2020, October 1). Malware Analysis Report (MAR) MAR-10303705-1.v1 – Remote Access Trojan: SLOTHFULMEDIA. Retrieved October 2, 2020.

objects.description: [SLOTHFULMEDIA](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0533) can add, modify, and/or delete registry keys. It has changed the proxy configuration of a victim system by modifying the HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Internet Settings\ZoneMap registry.(Citation: CISA MAR SLOTHFULMEDIA October 2020)
